Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • Menu for the package `stsdas.toolbox.convfile':

  • mvrefer - Move reference files between systems
  • networking - Provide background information about IRAF networking
  • sun2vax - Convert images from Sun to Vax binary format
  • vax2sun - Convert images from Vax to Sun binary format
  • tconvert - Convert table format between Vax and Sun binary format

  • (Type "help convfile option=sysdoc" for general info about this package.)
